synopsis.text: Facility to 'Guide the Misguided,' under the pretense of curing a peculiar illness plaguing the younger generation: internet addiction. Ensnared in this deceptive institution, Hibiki finds himself trapped in a prison-like environment, with no hope of escape. As despair threatens to consume him, how will Hibiki confront the torments of this unforgiving hell? In a world where loneliness, skepticism, and defiance drive the youth towards the solace of technology, can Hibiki break free from the chains of his addiction and reclaim his life?"
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
